EmailTemplate.name: Contact Finance
EmailTemplate.subject: How to find out more about your payment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for contacting DealChicken. We are sorry to hear that you are having problems with your payment and request you contact our finance department directly for further assistance.
You can email our finance department at: nssc-ap@gannett.com. Your email must include:
Your name as it appears on your W-9 The business name as it appears on your W-9 The last four digits of the business’ TAX ID
Let me know if you have any additional questions.
Kind Regards,
DealChicken’s Merchant Loyalty Team
